title: Approach to a preparation of dataset combining digital mammographic images and patient clinical data from electronic medical records
details: V Kazarinova, Y Vasilev, A Vladzymyrskyy… - Quantitative Imaging in …, 2025
abstract: A process of generating datasets is complex, expensive, and labor-intensive. However, we can optimize this process by modifying existing datasets for their reuse, which also complies with the FAIR principles. In this work, we developed a method to …
